items.title: GeoDI Lab Undergraduate Researcher Receives UROP Award
items.description: We are delighted to share that Mathias Kreuziger, an undergraduate researcher in the GeoDI Lab, has been awarded a highly competitive Undergraduate Research Opportunities Program (UROP) award from the...

items.title: Making “Edges” Visible in Spatial Networks —  New Paper Published in Transactions in GIS
items.description: Spatial networks play a central role in understanding human–environment interactions in cities.

items.title: UMN and GeoDI Lab serve as the local hosts in ACM SIGSPATIAL 2025 at Minneapolis
